tool_description: Analyzes competitor websites, social media, and content strategies to identify their content themes, posting frequency, engagement patterns, and strategic approaches.

competitor_urls.description: URLs of competitor websites and social media profiles

content_types.description: Content types to analyze (blog, video, social, email, ads)

error_messages: Invalid URLs provided: Ensure all competitor URLs are valid and accessible.
Analysis period out of range: Must be between 7 and 365 days.
Unsupported content type: Use supported types (blog, video, social, email, ads).
Rate limit exceeded: Too many URLs requested for analysis period.
usage: Provide competitor_urls and analysis_period_days. Optionally specify content_types and engagement analysis preferences. Returns comprehensive competitor content analysis.

posting_frequency.description: Posting frequency analysis by competitor and content type

top_content_themes.description: Most common content themes and topics

content_gaps.description: Identified gaps in competitor content coverage

best_performing_content.description: Highest performing content pieces by engagement
